title: Search bar doesn't allow editing of search terms
content: Since the most recent update, the search bar doesn't allow editing of search terms after the search has been executed. For example if I type "firefox update broke search bar" into the search bar and perform a search, I am unable to revise the search terms by clicking into the search box and editing some of the text. It selects all text, and I can not make a partial selection or add text to perform a revised search. Instead, I must now input all the text from scratch for each search iteration.
creator: tparrott

title: A host of problems
content: I started Firefox today with no websites displayed in the new tab section. Everything I had in there is empty, and all of my search parties from the settings are gone. Duckduckgo was set to default but that is now gone and there is NO option for a search engine as they are all gone. The right click menu is also displaying every option possible making to top to bottom on a 4k screen and then some. When typing in the address bar, it will usually autocomplete and that is also not functioning.

title: Access Dened
content: I have never had a problem with Firefox but now I have to constantly switch to Chrome. I get an Access denied error ALL THE TIME now. I can get past the home page of www.macys.com but when I go to login I get an access denier error. I hate whatever update or download that caused this issue. Fix it please!!!

title: Firefox browser switching
content:
About one half of the time when I search ANYTHING using ONLY GOOGLE, (all the other search engines are turned off), It randomly has the search engine switch to Yahoo. This is extremely frustrating and I used to be able to fix it by just hitting the back arrow when i see the very long yahoo URL, but now I cannot fix it when I hit the back arrow. Please help me.

Thank you

title: How to get rid of square tab named "firefox view" to "sync with other devices"??
content: How to get rid of square tab named "firefox view" to "sync with other devices"?? This extra tab takes up room on the page and I just want to get rid of it but there is no apparent way to close it. How do I get rid of it?
